# Agregyst

Write lessons for the "concours de l'agr√©gation" in the usual two-column format.

## Basic uage

Start a new project with this template in the web app or locally to get a usage example.

## Example result

![First page: Compact text in two-column format on a horizontal page, including headings, definitions, examples and other items.](examples/coordination-1.png)
![Second page.](examples/coordination-2.png)
![Third page.](examples/coordination-3.png)
![Fourth page: The left column contains a summary of the lesson. The right column contains additional information and a bibliography.](examples/coordination-4.png)

## Limitations

- Bibliography must use the [Hayagriva YAML format](https://github.com/typst/hayagriva/blob/main/docs/file-format.md). BibTeX files are not supported.
- The `recap` function doesn't work with more than three pages.
